Class DatalogValidator

java.lang.Object
edu.harvard.seas.pl.abcdatalog.ast.validation.DatalogValidator
public class DatalogValidator extends Object
A validator for a set of clauses. It converts a set of clauses to a program, which consists of a set of initial facts and a set of rules for deriving new facts. The rules in a program are guaranteed to be valid.
